description:
Kall-Su, one of the leaders of the Dark Rebel Armies, receives word that Gara has betrayed the army. Kall-Su then orders fellow Four Divine Kings member Arshes Nei, a.k.a. the Thunder Empress, to take out Dark Schneider. Nei turns to her trusty underlings, the Three Sorcerer Generals, and sends Sean Hari on the mission.
Source: Official Website
